titles.title: Honoring the life and accomplishments of Kurt Vonnegut, Jr. and extending the condolences of the House of Representatives to his family on the occasion of his death.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/19/2007--Introduced. Extends condolences to the family of Kurt Vonnegut Jr. (author of the novel "Slaughterhouse Five") on the occasion of his death.
